data.title: A taco by any other name...
data.text:
The service was excellent and the tacos were huge - much larger than the street-style tacos you get in SoCal.  They were tasty, a good value, and come with small bag of complimentary chips and salsa.  

What is fun though is that they are aiming to stretch the idea of a taco. For example, they offer one "American" style that substitutes French fries for the meat. Who wouldn't love that to be the vegetarian option on the menu!

data.title: Excellent food!
data.text:
By far, the nachos are the best value and best tasting nachos I have ever had. For $10, you get a giant box of chips with melted cheese, guacamole, sour cream, and more cheese, topped with your choice of meat. I indulge in this meal way too often and now that there is one located less than a block from my office, it gets me in trouble.

For a chain restaurant, this is by far my chain of choice.
